function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poorly controlled tourism development","Impact":"Negative impact on the region, environment, and local population","Mitigation":"Actively communicate with local communities and work alongside them for the development of sustainable tourism","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, sustainable tourism planning tools","People":"Local communities, environment, local population","Owner":"Local authorities, tourism agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of respect for local traditions and landscape","Impact":"Negative experiences for the communities, hindrance to sustainable tourism","Mitigation":"Education and awareness programs for tour operators, integration of local culture into tourism activities","Technologies":"Cultural preservation apps, virtual reality tools for cultural education","People":"Local communities, tour operators","Owner":"Local tourism authorities, cultural preservation organizations"}]}
